text:
@SFAactive @chrishattoncedr @HumanRightsCtte @NHSEngland In the meantime, might it not be an idea to let the people who understand the inaccessible information
pull it out by whatever means available,
have a good look at it, and
explain it to everyone else?
Yes, 'perfect' should be the aim, but right now people are missing useful info.
